verbs.description: [V: is] the vatican getting ready to censor catholic sites online is the vatican getting ready to censor catholic sites online one passage in the final document of the recently - completed synod of bishops is raising eyebrows is this a bad idea is it as one site claims soviet - style censorship well in theory it does n't sound all that different from the time - honored practice of issuing a nihil obstat or imprimatur on a published diocesan bishop official nihil obstat bishop
